title: Big in China: No Limits for ‘Special’ Ineos Grenadiers Trainee Artem Shmidt
content:
The Atlanta classics hopeful on wanting to emulate Filippo Ganna and racing around the world, as Ineos Grenadiers management are full of praise.

Read the full article at Big in China: No Limits for ‘Special’ Ineos Grenadiers Trainee Artem Shmidt on Velo.
author: Andy McGrath
